itemDescription: British banker and former CEO of C. Hoare & Co

wikipedia_page.main: Alexander S. Hoare is a British banker. He served as the Chief Executive of C. Hoare & Co from 2001 to 2009.

response: Alexander S. Hoare, the former chief executive of the bank, represents the eleventh generation to manage C. Hoare & Co. He has been replaced by the first non-family member in an executive position: Jeremy Marshall, former head of Credit Suisse Private Bank.C. Hoare & Co. - Company Profile. Reference For Business. Accessed 24 September 2009.
